org.mule.munit
Class FTPServerModule

java.lang.Object
  org.mule.munit.FTPServerModule
Direct Known Subclasses:
FTPServerModuleCapabilitiesAdapter
@Module(name="ftpserver",
        schemaVersion="1.0")
public class FTPServerModule
extends java.lang.Object

FTP server for Integration tests.

With this module you can start a FTP server on your local machine
